    • Constructor Detail

        public Checkers()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main method where the program will begin execution.

      • setRedPlayer

        public void setRedPlayer(CheckerPlayer player)
        This method is used to specify who will be making the move decisions for the red player.
        Parameters:
        player - This is the player that will be making reds moves.

      • setBlackPlayer

        public void setBlackPlayer(CheckerPlayer player)
        This method is used to specify who will be making the move decisions for the black player.
        Parameters:
        player - This is the player that will be making blacks moves.

      • setMoveOnClick

        public void setMoveOnClick(boolean b)
        This method allows us to set the moveOnClick variable from outside this class.
        Parameters:
        b - This is the value moveOnClick will be set to.

      • play

        public void play()
        This method is called to check and see if the player whos turn it is is being operated by a computer player. If so, the computer player will be called upon to decide on which move to make next.

      • squareClicked

        public void squareClicked(int row,
                          int column)
        This method is called when a square is clicked on the checkerboard. The rows start at the top and go down with indexes starting at 0 The columns start from the left and go right with the indexes starting at 0
        Parameters:
        row - This specifies the row that was clicked on.
        column - This specifies the column that was clicked on.
